channel.description: Recent content in nancy Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with nancy
item.description: Create a simple self-hosted Nancy application # Use Nuget to install the Nancy and Nancy.Hosting.Self packages into the project. Instantiate a new NancyHost object and pass in the relevant URL using( var host = new NancyHost( hostConfiguration, new Uri( "http://localhost:1234" ) ) ) { host.Start(); Console.WriteLine( "Running on http://localhost:1234" ); Console.ReadLine(); } Place this code in your project at the point when you wish to start listening for http traffic. 3.

item.title: .net core support status
item.description: This topic shows the latest status of NancyFx compatibility with .Net Core. Community support is highly welcome to update this. Status # Currently there are numerous incompatibilities with .Net core. This will show status of NancyFx package status. This is grouped by functionality. Currently support is for Nancy 2.* which has not released a stable version yet. Nancy core # Nancy : 2.0.0-clinteastwood Nancy Boostrappers # Nancy.Bootstrappers.Ninject - Not Supported
